content: **knitted mittens in drops lima or drops karisma the piece is worked from finger-tips to cuff with nordic pattern ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #forestfrostmittens drops design pattern u-993 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s/m l/xl circumference 21-23 cm length 24-26 cm **yarn** drops lima from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 100-100 g colour 9030 dark ivy 50-50 g colour 0206 wheat or use drops karisma from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 100-100 g colour 87 moss green 50-50 g colour 85 light beige **needles** drops double pointed needles size 3 mm **knitting gauge** 23 stitches in width and 32 row in height with stocking stitch and nordic pattern on needle size 3 mm = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches within 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches within 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
